personalized_retention_message:
Subject: [Customer Name], Say Goodbye to Data Overages! An Exclusive Offer Just For You

Hi [Customer Name],

We hope you're enjoying your service with [Your Company Name]! We truly appreciate you being a valued member of our family for over a year now.

We've been looking at your account and noticed something important. It seems like your current Limited_2GB plan might not be keeping up with your data needs – we've seen you go over your limit about 4 times a month. We understand how frustrating it can be to hit your data cap, especially when you're busy connecting with friends, streaming videos, or just browsing online, and then getting those unexpected extra charges.

As someone who's super connected, 2GB just isn't cutting it, and we want to make sure you have the best experience without worrying about your data usage or those extra fees adding up. Right now, when you factor in your monthly overages, you're likely paying more than you realize for limited data.

That's why we've put together a special, personalized offer designed specifically for you:

**Introducing the 'Unstoppable Data Plan' – just for [Customer Name]!**

We'd like to invite you to upgrade to our **Unstoppable Data Plan**, which includes:

*   **20GB of High-Speed Data:** That's 10 times more high-speed data than your current plan! More than enough for all your streaming, gaming, and social media.
*   **Unlimited Talk & Text:** Stay connected without limits.
*   **No More Overage Fees:** Once you hit 20GB, your data will simply slow down, but you'll *never* pay extra. Your bill will be predictable and stress-free.

**Here's the best part:**

Your current plan costs $30/month, but with 4 overages, your *actual* monthly cost is likely closer to $40-$50.

We're offering you this **Unstoppable Data Plan** for just **$35/month**.

**But wait, there's more for being a loyal customer!**

As a special thank you for being with [Your Company Name] for over a year, we'll give you **50% off your first 3 months** on this new plan! That means you'll pay just **$17.50 for the first three months**, then $35/month – significantly less than what you're likely paying now with overages, for *much more* data!

**Why this plan is perfect for you:**

*   **Freedom to connect:** No more worrying about hitting your data limit.
*   **Predictable billing:** Say goodbye to unexpected overage charges.
*   **Better value:** Get significantly more data for less than your current *total* spend.

We want you to have the data you need to stay connected to what matters most. This exclusive offer is our way of ensuring you get the best value and experience possible.

Ready to say goodbye to data overages and unlock unlimited connectivity?

**Click here to upgrade now:** [Link to your upgrade page/specific offer page]
(This offer is valid for a limited time and expires on [Date - e.g., 2 weeks from now]).

If you have any questions or would like to discuss this offer, simply reply to this email or call us at [Your Customer Service Number] and mention this special offer. Our team is ready to help you switch seamlessly!

We're here to help you get the most out of your mobile experience.

Sincerely,

The Team at [Your Company Name]
